page.title: 02ARMED FORCES / ATTITUDES
page.content:
{ARMED FORCES { ATTITUDES
Several people are employed at Plymouth {Naval}Dockyards.The peaceful atmosphere of {LIFTON}is occasionally shattered by the screech of jet engines as{R.A.F}Fighter planes from {R.A.F }Chivenor practice overhead. From our surveys we found people to be generally contented,pleased with the area and happy to live here. However,some worries were mentioned like the proposed new by-pass on the A30 which may cause disruption to shopkeepers and farmers whose land will be used.Many residents will be pleased about the proposed by-pass because it will be less noisy and less dangerous than at present.The present authors both live on the {A30}but only find it inconvenient in summer.
